argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvop.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvop.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvop.6 | |- N = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nvrel | |- Rel NrmCVec |
| 5 |  | #P_1st2nd | |- ( ( Rel NrmCVec /\ U e. NrmCVec ) -> U = <. ( 1st ` U ) , ( 2nd ` U ) >. ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpan | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> U = <. ( 1st ` U ) , ( 2nd ` U ) >. ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_nmcvfval | |- N = ( 2nd ` U ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_opeq2i | |- <. ( 1st ` U ) , N >. = <. ( 1st ` U ) , ( 2nd ` U ) >. |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` U ) = ( 1st ` U ) |
| 10 | 9, 1, 2 | #P_nvvop | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( 1st ` U ) = <. G , S >. ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_opeq1d | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> <. ( 1st ` U ) , N >. = <. <. G , S >. , N >. ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_syl5eqr | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> <. ( 1st ` U ) , ( 2nd ` U ) >. = <. <. G , S >. , N >. ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> U = <. <. G , S >. , N >. ) |
